TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TabControl extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 管理相关的选项卡页集。

span.span: Manages a related set of tab pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含选项卡页，由 您通过属性添加的对象表示 。A contains tab pages, which are represented by objects that you add through the property. 此集合中选项卡页的顺序反映了选项卡在控件中的显示顺序。The order of tab pages in this collection reflects the order the tabs appear in the control. 用户可以 通过单击控件中的选项卡之一来更改当前。The user can change the current by clicking one of the tabs in the control. 你还可以 使用下列属性之一以编程方式更改当前的 ：You can also programmatically change the current by using one of the following properties: - - 在中 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] ，还可以使用下列方法之一：In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], you can also use one of the following methods: - - 在中 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] ，你可以通过处理以下事件之一来响应当前选项卡更改：In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], you can respond when the current tab changes by handling one of the following events: - - - - 中的选项卡 是的一部分 ，但不是各个控件的组成部分 。The tabs in a are part of the , but not parts of the individual controls. 类的成员（ 如 属性）仅影响选项卡页的客户端矩形，而不影响选项卡。Members of the class, such as the property, affect only the client rectangle of the tab page, but not the tabs. 此外，的 方法 将不会隐藏选项卡。若要隐藏选项卡，必须 从集合中删除该控件 。Additionally, the method of the will not hide the tab. To hide the tab, you must remove the control from the collection. 在中 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] ，选项卡被视为选项卡页的一部分，用于确定何时 发生的和 事件 。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the and events of the occur. 在 .NET Framework 的早期版本中， 和 事件 不会在焦点进入或离开选项卡时出现，但仅当焦点进入或离开选项卡页的客户端矩形时才会发生。In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the and events of the do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page. 不会为类引发以下事件， 除非集合中至少有一个 ： 、、、、、 和 。The following events are not raised for the class unless there is at least one in the collection: , , , , , , and . 如果集合中至少有一个 ，并且用户与选项卡控件的标头 (交互，其中的 名称显示) ，则会 引发相应的事件。If there is at least one in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the names appear), the raises the appropriate event. 但是，如果用户交互位于 选项卡页的内，则会 引发相应的事件。However, if the user interaction is within the of the tab page, the raises the appropriate event. 在 显示选项卡页之前，不会创建中包含的控件，并且在显示选项卡页之前，不会激活这些控件中的任何数据绑定。Controls contained in a are not created until the tab page is shown, and any data bindings in these controls are not activated until the tab page is shown. 启用视觉样式并将 属性设置为以外的值时 ，选项卡内容可能无法正确呈现。When visual styles are enabled, and the property is set to a value other than , the tab contents might not render correctly. 若要解决此问题，可以使用所有者描述自行绘制选项卡内容。To work around this issue, you can paint the tab contents yourself using owner drawing. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：显示具有 TabControl 的边对齐选项卡](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-side-aligned-tabs-with-tabcontrol)。For more information, see [How to: Display Side-Aligned Tabs with TabControl](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-side-aligned-tabs-with-tabcontrol). 如果将 属性设置为以外的值， 并且 属性设置为以外的值 ，则选项卡页内容可能不会正确呈现。When the property is set to a value other than and the property is set to a value other than , the tab page contents might not render correctly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 Visual Studio Windows 窗体设计器创建 包含三个选项卡页的。The following code example uses the Visual Studio Windows Forms Designer to create a with three tab pages. 每个选项卡页包含多个控件。Each tab page contains several controls. [!code-cpp[Classic TabControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TabControl Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic TabControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TabControl Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic TabControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic TabControl Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性设置为或时 ，属性将 自动设置为 `true` 。When the property is set to or , the property is automatically set to `true`. 如果将属性设置 为 ，则它仅在 属性设置为时才会显示 。When you set the property to , it only appears as such when the property is set to . 否则，该 属性将显示为，前提是设置为 值。Otherwise, the property displays as if set to the value. 将 属性设置为时 ，还必须将属性设置为， 以使按钮正确显示。When you set the property to , you must also set the property to so that the buttons display correctly. > [!NOTE] > 将 属性设置为时 `Buttons` ，还必须将属性设置为， `Top` 以便选项卡页的内容正确显示。When you set the property to `Buttons`, you must also set the property to `Top` so that the tab page contents display correctly. 此外，如果启用了视觉样式，并将 属性设置为以外的值 ，则选项卡内容可能不会正确呈现。Additionally, when visual styles are enabled, and the property is set to a value other than , the tab contents may not render correctly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 具有三个 对象的。The following code example creates a with three objects. 将 属性设置为 `Left` ，这将在左侧放置选项卡 `tabControl1` 。The property is set to `Left`, which positions the tabs of `tabControl1` on the left side. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当当前选项卡在中更改时 ，以下事件将按以下顺序发生。When the current tab changes in a , the following events occur in the following order. - - - - 如果 处于无效状态或更新新显示的状态，这些事件可以让你执行一些任务，如取消选项卡更改 。These events let you perform tasks such as canceling a tab change if a is in an invalid state or updating the state of a newly displayed . 当用户单击某个选项卡、调用 或 方法时，或者当你更改或属性的值时，当前选项卡会发生更改 。The current tab changes when the user clicks a tab, when you call the or method, or when you change the value of the or property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在此示例中，事件处理程序报告事件的发生 。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报表可帮助你了解何时发生事件，并可帮助你进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告多个事件或频繁发生的事件，请考虑 将消息替换为多行或将其追加到多行 。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行示例代码，请将其粘贴到包含名为的类型的实例的项目中 `TabControl1` 。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `TabControl1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序与事件相关联 。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法以编程方式取消选择中的特定选项卡 。Use this method to programmatically deselect a particular tab in a . 如果控件中至少有两个选项卡，则指定选项卡后面的选项卡成为当前选项卡。如果指定的选项卡是控件中的最后一个选项卡，则第一个选项卡将成为当前选项卡。If there are at least two tabs in the control, the tab following the specified tab becomes the current tab. If the specified tab is the last tab in the control, the first tab becomes the current tab.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还使派生类可以处理事件，而无需附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在中 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] ，此方法还会引发 当前的事件 。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], this method also raises the event of the current . 在中 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] ，选项卡被视为选项卡页的一部分，用于确定何时 发生的和 事件 。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the and events of the occur. 在 .NET Framework 的早期版本中， 和 事件 不会在焦点进入或离开选项卡时出现，但仅当焦点进入或离开选项卡页的客户端矩形时才会发生。In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the and events of the do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还使派生类可以处理事件，而无需附加委托。The method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 属性主要用于为全球受众开发窗体。The property is primarily useful for developing forms for worldwide audiences. 许多容器的设计使控件在容器中以从左到右的方式进行布局。Many containers are designed so that controls are laid out in the container in a left-to-right fashion. 这些容器与遵循这种书写方向的语言兼容。These containers are compatible with languages that follow this writing direction. 但是，当您向从右到左的语言的用户显示相同的容器时，通常最好反转窗体上的控件顺序。However, when you display the same containers to users of right-to-left languages, it is often preferable to reverse the order of the controls on the form. 如果 和 属性都为 `true` ，则将为容器和控件位置打开镜像，并且文本流将从右到左排列。If both the and properties are `true`, mirroring will be turned on for the container and control placement and text flow will be right-to-left. 更改此属性的值会引发 事件。Changing the value of this property raises the event. 有关全球化问题的详细信息，请参阅 [开发全球通用应用程序的最佳实践](/dotnet/standard/globalization-localization/best-practices-for-developing-world-ready-apps)。For more information about globalization issues, see [Best Practices for Developing World-Ready Applications](/dotnet/standard/globalization-localization/best-practices-for-developing-world-ready-apps).
